text:
@seanhannity Multiple studies found hydroxychloroquine is not effective and increases the death rate of COVID-19 patients. 

The NIH now recommends against combining hydroxychloroquine and azithromycin.

Fox News and Trump repeatedly promoted both, in some cases lying.
https://t.co/YOUfOuvJzi
